Room.Name: Red Dog Saloon
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main public room of the Red Dog Saloon.
Room.LongDescription: The place is crowded and smoky, making it difficult to find a table. As you look around you note that most of the patrons are pirates, and that most of them are roaring drunk. This might not be a fun place to be for a landlubber. There is a long, polished bar over at one side, and a great many tables and chairs around the room. A curtain covers a small stage at the end of the room.
